title: Apple Reports 3Q 2020 Results: $11.25B Profit on $59.7B Revenue, 4-for-1 Stock Split Announced
description: Apple today announced financial results for the third fiscal quarter of 2020, which corresponds to the second calendar quarter of the year.

title: EU clears Alstom's acquisition of Bombardier rail unit
description: The European Commission has cleared the acquisition of the rail business of Canadian engineering firm Bombardier by French train maker Alstom

title: NBCUniversal Sells Entire Stake In Peloton
description: In an SEC filing, NBCUniversal said it saw a $86 million gain on its investment in the fitness company in the second quarter of this year.

title: KKR to take majority stake in MasterD
description: KKR has agreed to acquire a majority stake in Zaragoza, Spain-based MasterD, a vocational training company. No financial terms were disclosed. MasterDss founder Luis Gomez and the management team will reinvest alongside KKR.

title: IPS bids to raise stake in Seacom

title: Wedbush raises AAPL target to $475 after earnings 'performance for the ages'
description: Investment bank Wedbush is raising its AAPL price target to $475 on Apple's "Picasso-like" June quarter earnings results and the expectation of an "iPhone 12 super cycle."

title: Minnesota company gets most aid in Iowa hog disposal program
description: Christensen Farms, one of the nations largest family-owned pork producers, has received $1.86 million from the Iowa Disposal Assistance Program, or 72% of the $2.6 million the program has paid to date.

title: TTM Technologies (NASDAQ:TTMI) Rating Increased to Buy at BidaskClub
description: TTM Technologies (NASDAQ:TTMI) was upgraded by stock analysts at BidaskClub from a œhold rating to a œbuy rating in a research report issued on Saturday, BidAskClub reports. Other research analysts also recently issued research reports about the company.

title: Medicaid Expansion applications open August 1, more than 90,000 Nebraskans eligible
description: Starting Saturday, roughly 90,000 Nebraskans can apply to get benefits under the Medicaid expansion bill Nebraska voted on almost two years ago. Medicaid provides healthcare coverage to those who cant otherwise afford it.

title: Globant (GLOB) Launches Continuity Studio
description: Technology services company Globant SA (NYSE: GLOB) has announced the launch of the Continuity Studio product in order to help businesses face new challenges caused by the pandemic.

title: Durante Rentals Appoints Liam J. Harrington as President
description: Durante Rentals announced the appointment of Liam J. Harrington as their new President. In this expanded role, Liam will be responsible for day-to-day operations, sales, marketing, technology, and finance.

title: PCB appoints new CFO after six months
description: LAHORE: The Pakistan Cricket Board (PCB) has appointed its new chief financial officer (CFO) after six months. Javed Murtaza is the new CFO. The emergency meeting of the Board of Governors summoned on Thursday gave approval to the appointment.

title: Zilliqa appoints crypto custody service Onchain Custodian to secure assets
description: Zilliqa, the high-performance and high-security blockchain platform, announced that it has selected Singapore-based crypto custody service Onchain Custodian to secure its networks assets.

title: IPO Update:  Proposes IPO Terms
description: Acutus Medical intends to raise $125 million in an IPO of its common stock. The firm is developing and commercializing cardiac ablation tools.

title: Exclusive: SenseTime eyes STAR market IPO after $1.5 billion fundraising - sources
description: Chinese start-up SenseTime is considering an initial public offering (IPO) on China's tech-focused STAR market after its latest fundraising that will value the company at $10 billion, three people with knowledge of the matter said.
